ACCOUNT_LOCKED_PERM.description: User account has been permanently locked

data.remaining: The amount of time remaining before account is unlocked

ACCOUNT_LOCKED_TEMP.description: User account has been temporarily locked

ACCOUNT_NOT_LOCALAUTHD.description: Specified account is not authenticated with local auth

INVALID_PASSWORD.description: Provided password does not match that stored

data.length: the minimum required number of characters

INVALID_PASSWORD_LENGTH.description: Password must be at least the required number of characters

INVALID_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE.description: Password must contain at least one uppercase character

INVALID_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE.description: Password must contain at least one lowercase character

INVALID_PASSWORD_NUMBER.description: Password must contain at least one number

INVALID_PASSWORD_SPECIAL.description: Password must contain at least one special character (#?!@$%^&*-)
